title: Gorgeous XL 1BR, Elevator, Very Safe, Quiet, Clean, Parking
posting_body: ['This is a remodeled and very spacious 1 BR garden apartment with sunny wide open views from all windows.', 'The space is located in  a  Clean, Safe, and Well maintained elevator building with full onsite amenities.', 'Bedroom will fit KING sized bed with plenty of room to spare.', 'The Kitchen has brand new stainless steel appliances, new cabinetry, and counters, the Bath features designer finished porcelain tiles with glass mosaic trim and cherry cabinetry.', 'The floors are 100% oak parquet and the colossal living room has a faux fireplace.', 'Most importantly all the current building occupants are well educated , courteous, and respectful persons who value like minded neighbors.', 'The building has on site laundry and off street parking is available from neighboring homes.', 'The Woodlawn stop on the Metro North is only a 30 minute ride to Grand Central and the 2,5,4 D Trains are also a walkable distance away.', 'Rent includes heat and hot water, and full laundry is on site.', 'We require a 720 + credit score and 55 K/yr income.', 'No smokers, No dogs please.', 'NOTE When responding provide your credit score, annual income, number of persons in your party along with call back number.', 'This offer is by landlord and there is no fee to view or rent.']
